document.heading: Child Care Services Assistance Fund Act of 1988

history.narrative: Law 7-220, the “Child Care Services Assistance Fund Act of 1988,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-405, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 29, 1988 and December 13, 1988, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 6, 1989, it was assigned Act No. 7-295 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
